moves.name: Rock Climb
moves.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.
